title: Panel, mid-20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand drawn and mechanical resist, paint and immersion dyed on plain weave (batik)
description: Within a semi-circle frame, person in a large hat seated among cacti. Other cactus plants throughout the field. Red, green, brown, yellow, purple, and three shades of blue. Two horizontal bands of pattern at one end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, mid-20th century.
mid-20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: hand drawn and mechanical resist, paint and immersion dyed on plain weave (batik). Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-318.
